Blackcliff_Slasher.description: An extremely sturdy greatsword from the Blackcliff Forge. It has a dark crimson color from the blade to the pommel.
Blackcliff_Slasher.name: Blackcliff Slasher
Blackcliff_Slasher.effect: After defeating an opponent, ATK is increased by 12% for 30s. This effect has a maximum of 3 stacks, and the duration of each stack is independent of the others.

Bloodtainted_Greatsword.description: A steel sword that is said to have been coated with dragon blood, rendering it invulnerable to damage. This effect is not extended to its wielder, however.
Bloodtainted_Greatsword.name: Bloodtainted Greatsword
Bloodtainted_Greatsword.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Pyro or Electro by 12%.

Debate_Club.description: A handy club made of fine steel. The most persuasive line of reasoning in any debater's arsenal.
Debate_Club.name: Debate Club
Debate_Club.effect: After using an Elemental Skill, Normal or Charged Attacks, on hit, deal an additional 60% ATK DMG in a small area. Effect lasts 15s. DMG can only occur once every 3s.

Favonius_Greatsword.description: A heavy ceremonial sword of the Knights of Favonius. It channels elemental power easily and is highly destructive.
Favonius_Greatsword.name: Favonius Greatsword
Favonius_Greatsword.effect: CRIT Hits have a 60% chance to generate a small amount of Elemental Particles, which will regenerate 6 Energy for the character. Can only occur once every 12s.

Ferrous_Shadow.description: A replica of the famed sword of Arundolyn, the Lion of Light. Feel the power of a legendary hero as you hold this sword in your hand! Imagine yourself as the great warrior himself! Note: Daydreaming not recommended in live combat.
Ferrous_Shadow.name: Ferrous Shadow
Ferrous_Shadow.effect: When HP falls below 70%, increases Charged Attack DMG by 30%, and Charged Attacks become much harder to interrupt.

Lithic_Blade.description: A greatsword carved and chiseled from the very bedrock of Liyue.
Lithic_Blade.name: Lithic Blade
Lithic_Blade.effect: For every character in the party who hails from Liyue, the character who equips this weapon gains 6% ATK increase and 2% CRIT Rate increase.

Old_Merc_Pal.description: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.
Old_Merc_Pal.name: Old Merc's Pal

Prototype_Aminus.description: An ancient greatsword discovered in the Blackcliff Forge. It swings with such an immense force that one feels it could cut straight through reality itself.
Prototype_Aminus.name: Prototype Archaic (Formerly Aminus)
Prototype_Aminus.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Claymore Prototype, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Prototype_Aminus.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks have a 50% chance to deal an additional 240% ATK DMG to opponents within a small AoE. Can only occur once every 15s.

Quartz.description: A simple but heavy greatsword made of polished black quartz with a golden gilt. It has an air of elegance and dignity about it.
Quartz.name: Quartz
Quartz.effect: Upon causing an Overloaded, Melt, Burning, Vaporize, or a Pyro-infused Swirl reaction, increases Base ATK by 20% for 12s.

Rainslasher.description: A fluorescent greatsword with no sharp edge that crushes enemies with brute force and raw power.
Rainslasher.name: Rainslasher
Rainslasher.effect: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by 20%.

Royal_Greatsword.description: An old greatsword that belonged to the erstwhile rulers of Mondstadt. It is made from the finest-quality materials and has stood the test of time. A weapon for use by royals only.
Royal_Greatsword.name: Royal Greatsword
Royal_Greatsword.effect: Upon damaging an opponent, increases CRIT Rate by 8%. Max 5 stacks. A CRIT hit removes all stacks.

Sacrificial_Greatsword.description: A ceremonial greatsword that has become petrified over time. The trinkets on it are still visible. It grants the wielder the power to withstand the winds of time.
Sacrificial_Greatsword.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
Sacrificial_Greatsword.effect: After damaging an opponent with an Elemental Skill, the skill has a 40% chance to end its own CD. Can only occur once every 30s.

Serpent_Spine.description: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.
Serpent_Spine.name: Serpent Spine
Serpent_Spine.effect: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal 6% more DMG and take 3% more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

Skyrider_Greatsword.description: A reliable steel sword. The legendary Skyrider once tried to ride it as a flying swordâ€¦ for the second time.
Skyrider_Greatsword.name: Skyrider Greatsword
Skyrider_Greatsword.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.5s.

Skyward_Pride.description: A claymore that symbolizes the pride of Dvalin soaring through the skies. When swung, it emits a deep hum as the full force of Dvalin's command of the sky and the wind is unleashed.
Skyward_Pride.name: Skyward Pride
Skyward_Pride.effect: Increases all DMG by 8%. After using an Elemental Burst, Normal or Charged Attack, on hit, creates a vacuum blade that does 80% of ATK as DMG to opponents along its path. Lasts for 20s or 8 vacuum blades.

Snow-Tombed_Starsilver.description: An ancient greatsword that was stored between frescoes. Forged from Starsilver, it has the power to cleave through ice and snow.
Snow-Tombed_Starsilver.name: Snow-Tombed Starsilver
Snow-Tombed_Starsilver.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Claymore Prototype, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x Starsilver)
Snow-Tombed_Starsilver.effect:
Hitting an opponent with Normal and Charged Attacks has a 60% chance of forming and dropping an Everfrost Icicle above them, dealing 80% AoE ATK DMG.
Opponents affected by Cryo are dealt 200% ATK DMG. Can only occur once every 10s.

The_Bell.description: The damage increase from being shielded works with any shield, not just the one generated by The Bell's effect.
The_Bell.name: The Bell
The_Bell.effect: Taking DMG generates a shield which absorbs DMG up to 20% of max HP. This shield lasts for 10s or until broken, and can only be triggered once every 45s. While protected by the shield, the character gains 12% increased DMG.

The_Unforged.description: Capable of driving away evil spirits and wicked people alike, this edgeless claymore seems to possess divine might.
The_Unforged.name: The Unforged
The_Unforged.effect: Increases Shield Strength by 20%, scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by 4% for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%

Waster_Greatsword.description: A sturdy sheet of iron that may be powerful enough to break apart mountains, if wielded with enough willpower.
Waster_Greatsword.name: Waster Greatsword

White_Iron_Greatsword.description: A claymore made from white iron. Lightweight without compromising on power. Effective even when wielded by one of average strength, it is extremely deadly in the hands of a physically stronger wielder.
White_Iron_Greatsword.name: White Iron Greatsword

Whiteblind.description: An exotic sword with one section of the blade left blunt. It made its way into Liyue via the hands of foreign traders. Incredibly powerful in the hands of someone who knows how to use it.
Whiteblind.name: Whiteblind
Whiteblind.obtained: Forging (1x Northlander Claymore Prototype, 50x Crystal Chunk, 50x White Iron Chunk)
Whiteblind.effect: On hit, Normal or Charged Attacks increase ATK and DEF by 6% for 6s. Max 4 stacks (24% total). Can only occur once every 0.5s.

Wolf_Gravestone.description: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.
Wolf_Gravestone.name: Wolf's Gravestone
Wolf_Gravestone.effect: Increases ATK by 20%. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by 40% for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
